name: Christmas Cake Maker - Santa Cooking Game
name_original: Christmas Cake Maker - Santa Cooking Game
description:
It's time to celebrate the new Christmas Season.
This time,Santa Claus decided to prepare and serve delicious cakes with different flavors for kids,as the Christmas gifts.
But he needs a assistant to help him,now help Santa to pick the required ingredients in supermarket and make Christmas special cakes with fresh fruits, candy and cream.then decorate the Christmas Cakes as nicely as possible in this cooking game.Enjoy!

Much fun.
